title: Qubes OS: How it works, and a demo of this VM-centric OS

media:group.media:title: Qubes OS: How it works, and a demo of this VM-centric OS
media:group.media:description:
This unique and secure distro runs everything under separate virtual machines. Even the desktop itself! The idea is to have different VM's be used for different tasks (work, personal life), but it goes further than that.  Let's have a look.

Get Qubes OS : https://www.qubes-os.org/

Support my channel with Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/doriandotslash

MrGamer (@AndreasRohdin): https://soundcloud.com/gamermachine

#Linux #Qubes #QubesOS
